TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Atonan, title = Atonan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atonan} }

S.FORM: Atonan I tiniay i Cian Siang no Hualien ko Atonan a niyaro', 863 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 2,103 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 26% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 541 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 74% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,562 ko tamdaw. O pasinto no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko 'Amis 17%, Truku 2%, Tayal 1%, Bunun 3%, Paiwan 1%, Puyuma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Talihafan

Atonan I tiniay i Cian Siang no Hoalien ko Atonan a niyaro', 863 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 2,103 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 26% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 541 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 74% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,562 ko tamdaw. O pasinto no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko 'Amis 17%, Troko 2%, Tayal 1%, Bonon 3%, Paiwan 1%, Poyoma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Talihafan
